protein.specific_function: Conjugation of reduced glutathione to a wide number of exogenous and endogenous hydrophobic electrophiles.

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring alkyl or aryl (other than methyl) groups
